creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Col. Peter and Mrs Betty Peabody
description: Mt. Fuji in upper center looms behind rows and columns of brilliant green tea fields; white and abstracted waves of clouds surround mountain
medium: Woodblock print; ink and colors on paper
signed: bottom margin, in pencil: [月見さと茂 / 15/70]
title: Green Tea Fields of Shizuoka (Mt. Fuji)
